summary: UI styling and components were revamped toward a romantic parchment theme and video playback logic was updated to autoplay with sound and no looping. However, the required generated image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` are not present in this diff (no files added), and the message-view helper text about a ~31s video is not evidenced in the provided truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add static parchment/paper texture and subtle decorative accent artwork as generated image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and reference them directly in the React UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows zero added files and no `frontend/public/assets/generated/*` assets were added, yet CSS references `/assets/generated/parchment-texture.dim_2000x2000.png`. This indicates the required image assets are missing from the change set.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the message view, the video upload control includes helper text indicating the selected short video (e.g., ~31 seconds) will play when â€œYesâ€ is clicked.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided `ValentineLetter.tsx` diff is truncated around the message view and does not show any upload helper text communicating ~31 seconds. Without explicit evidence in the diff content, this AC cannot be verified as implemented.
